title.narrative: Enhancing Disaster Preparedness and capacity for initial rapid response-Tanganik

description.narrative: This project falls under the National Change Objectives (NCOS3). It is linked to the Oxfam International (OI) preparedness and response plan and coherent with the horn, East and Central Africa (HECA) vision 2010. Contributing to reduce the impact of humanitarian disasters on up to 250 000 affected people in Tanganyika Province, this project will increase the effectiveness and timeliness of Oxfam's responses to humanitarian emergencies in Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) by establishment of an effectively managed and appropriate contingency stock, and setting up an Oxfam Emergency Response Team. Activities associate also the salary costs of the Humanitarian Programme manager post and core staff.
